title: Noodles and Company
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Japanese, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fast food casual chain with seven vegan options (including some that require modification). Organic tofu can be added to any dish. They offer pasta, soups, salads, and sandwiches. Serves Thai, Italian, American, Chinese and Indian cuisines in addition to Japanese.
